top_categories.workout_context: 69ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Flint Hills Death Ride's Kansas Flint Hills, Rolling prairie gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 65 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Flint Hills Death Ride's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before April.
At Flint Hills Death Ride, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Flint Hills Death Ride. Train it until it feels boring.
65 miles on Kansas Flint Hills gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
When someone attacks on Kansas Flint Hills gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
Varied gradients on Kansas Flint Hills gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Flint Hills Death Ride, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on Kansas Flint Hills gravel. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Low-cadence force work for 4,500ft of climbing. The slow, grinding ascents where you can't spin—you push.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Flint Hills Death Ride’s 65 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Flint Hills Death Ride requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on kansas flint hills gravel to build confidence. Expect: kansas flint hills, rolling prairie gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 65 miles of kansas flint hills gravel in Cottonwood Falls, Kansas.
